video_prompt: Rain streaks down a bus window. A young woman, subtly shifting, gazes thoughtfully as a blurred figure walks past outside. Reflections from passing vehicles and traffic lights ripple on the wet street. The scene slowly pans, revealing a melancholic cityscape.
image_prompt: Anime style, full shot, young woman on bus, rainy day, looking out window. Vertical composition, fair skin, dark long braided hair, dark headphones with red accents, dark hoodie, dark pants, hands clasped. Vibrant blue bus seat. Urban street scene outside, rain effects, red car, blurred person walking. Wet street reflections (green, red lights). Soft, subdued lighting. Cool color palette (blues, grays). Melancholic mood.
refined_video_prompt: Rain streaks down the bus window. A young woman subtly shifts, her thoughtful gaze following a blurred figure walking past outside. Reflections from passing vehicles and traffic lights actively ripple across the wet street. The scene slowly pans, the melancholic cityscape unfurling and altering in view.
